data.message: My Facebook account was hacked and hacker changed my name and it is now 60 days for me to change it again and when I try to login to change the name before the end of the specified period (60 days), the link does not help me please help

replies.message: We're sorry to hear that. If your account has been taken over by someone else, please secure it here: http://bit.ly/2wOapE4. You can also submit an appeal for your name change by filling out this form: http://bit.ly/2i5hduN. -Kiara
I can not access the name change form when accessing the link you gave it to me so when I click on Please tell us the interface remains the same with the internet in good condition !!!!
